name: road drift
description:
The only thing standing between you and victory on the next track and beyond is the timer on your screen and the integrity of your car! Race to beat the timer at all costs, and try not to crash or fall to your doom too often, lest you wreck the car!

Controls: For Controllers:

Break: Spacebar

Reset Scene: L

Main Menu: Escape

Pause: P

Boost: Shift

Move: Arrow Keys Move: Analog Stick
